item.title: Version 5.0.0
item.description:
Focusmo 5.0.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Workspaces - Windows Auto-Setup:
    • One-click -> block websites and apps, open work apps, align in window
  • Timeline View:
    • Detailed day overview with precise time slot tracking
  • Streamlined Settings UI: Intuitive redesign of preferences interface for easier navigation and customization
  • Unified App Interface:
    • All screens now integrated into a single app window
    • Introduced side panel for seamless navigation
  • Pomodoro System Redesign:
    • Complete redesign of the Pomodoro workflow
    • Enhanced usability and user experience
  • Breathing Preparation:
    • New Breathing Intro feature with session ending warnings
    • Helps you mentally prepare for focused work sessions
  • Fullscreen Breaks:
    • Intentional break system to prevent burnout
    • Provides rest for eyes and maintains energy levels
  • Enhanced Floating Timer:
    • Improved status bar timer
    • More detailed Pomodoro tracking
  • Advanced Analytics:
    • 100% accurate work tracking
    • Comprehensive insights into your productivity
  • Onboarding Reimagined: A completely redesigned onboarding experience to help you set up Focusmo more effectively

Minor Updates

  • Cmd + Shift + M now toggles main window
  • Floating button now opens quick access window

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed: Menu bar mode functionality issues
